nodes.text: The Darstai'is Sickle was a curved blade wielded by the Sayormi Cyrans the Unfeeling. Cyrans had honed the blade to perfection, so it cut with only the slightest bit of pressure. He took great care to keep his weapon in the best condition possible at all times.
In 1 ABY a spacer sent by Chief Kerritamba to kill Cyrans the Unfeeling took the two-handed weapon from Cyran's dead body.

Darstai'is Sickle was a weapon in Rage of the Wookiees, the second expansion pack to Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Players could loot it from Cyrans the Unfeeling in the Dead Forest region on Kashyyyk prior to the games closure on December 15, 2011.
